√śaṅk 'doubt'

present: [1.] śáṅkate etc. B.+  śáṅkati etc.  

[perfect: śaśaṅke  ]

aorist: [5.] śaṅkīs  śaṅkiṣṭhās E.+  śaṅkithās  

[future: śaṅkiṣyate  śaṅkitā  ]

verbal: śaṅkita E.+  śaṅkitum E.+  -śaṅkya  

secondary: passive: śaṅkitum etc.   -- causative: śaṅkayati  

derivatives: śaṅkā́ B.+  śaṅkin E.+  -śaṅkya S.+  śaṅkana? E.  śaṅkanīya E.+  śaṅkitavya E.+
